text: Shelley Stephens (born 29 July 1978) is a former New Zealand professional female tennis player. Stephens has won 2 singles and 21 doubles titles on the ITF circuit in her career. On 11 June 2001, she reached her best singles ranking of world number 249. On 4 March 2002, she peaked at world number 133 in the doubles rankings. Playing for New Zealand at the Fed Cup, Stephens has a win–loss record of 14–22. Stephens made her WTA main draw debut at the 2001 ASB Classic in the doubles event partnering María Emilia Salerni.
